mapper.select:
SELECT HIR_CD , CD_DIV_SU , HIR_CD_NM , HIR_CD_ORD , USE_YN , HIR_CD_DESC , CREATED_UID , UPDATED_UID FROM COM_HIR_CODE WHERE 1=1
AND HIR_CD_NM LIKE CONCAT( '%' , TRIM(UPPER(#{hirCdNm})), '%')
AND USE_YN = #{useYn}
ORDER BY CD_DIV_SU, HIR_CD_ORD
